channel.title: [PI] Huge Error D:
channel.description:
Sometimes when people try to logout of my server it sends this huge error in the server cmd.
[code] [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: mod keat - actionbutton: 9154 [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: Game saved for player mod keat [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Cl
[3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.remo rHandler.java:327) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.proc ler.java:130) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:151) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: Game saved for player mod keat [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Cl

[3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.remo rHandler.java:327) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.proc ler.java:175) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:151) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: Game saved for player mod keat [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Cl

[3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.remo rHandler.java:327) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.proc ler.java:130) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:151) [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: Game saved for player mod keat [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [3/8/11 9:19 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.destruct(Cl

Please help me!!! how do i fix this?!?!

item.title: [PI] Huge Error D:
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Chips Sun Chips
item.description:
@Sun_Chips wrote:

It looks like the server is disconnecting them and then trying to save there file which would result in a null-pointer but I could be wrong, look over your logout method.

Read full topic
